Switchblade smirked as his missles scored direct hits. "YESSSSS" he shouted
assuming victory was at hand. His cry of joy was prematurely inturupted as
two laser beams pierced the smoke below. "Cybrats beware, they're more
durable than we figured." The buglike bot swerved aside dodging the beams
scanning them as they struck the building behind him. a laser line connected
two blades on his arm, he launched it down onto the street below hoping to
measure Grimlocks strength by pinning him to the ground before disassembling
him.
------------------------------


The bot swears, spinning around and jumping back. His scanners locate the
bot that had attacked him, and he fires a missile back.

------------------------------------
Doggeds line had hit it's target but for some reason didn't hold. He lept
skyward drawing his disk launcher. He fired a stasis disk at the bum
planning on the disks energy draining qualities to down his opponent. A
missle steeked by him striking a building behind him. debris began to fall
forcing Doggeds attention to be diverted. he lept from side to side using
his speed to avoid the falling metal. he quickly grabbed a jagged piece of
metal andhurled it with all the velocity he could muster at the bum.
----- Original Message -----
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 8:13 AM
Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....


> Grimlock kept smelling Repugnas. Yes, he knew this robot. It was an
> Autobot. He sighed. That meant it would be wrong to rip it apart. "Me
> say are you..." he was cut off as the two armor piercing shells hit him,
> and exploded, sending him falling on his side. He snarled, turned his
> head, and opened his mouth, letting loose a stream of laser fire at the
> attacker. "Yeh, now Dinobots stomp."
>
